news.content:
In the last 24 hours, we've had Titan v2.1 3Node pre-orders from all corners of the globe – six of the seven continents. (Anybody know anyone in Antarctica?)

❗️ Pre-orders are now live for the general public!

If you have any questions, please visit our FAQ first to see if you can find the answer there. If you don't find what you're looking for, join our two-way farmer chat here.
news.excerpt: Pre-orders for the Titan v2.1 are now open for the general public!
